title: Portfolio Application
description: A fully responsive portfolio application built from scratch using React and GitHub Copilot. The project showcases modern UI design, clean component structure, and demonstrates how AI-powered coding assistance can accelerate development. It serves as a central hub to highlight skills, projects, and contact information. The application is fully developed using AI tools, showcasing the potential of AI in software development.
